医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
针灸可减少乳腺癌女性的潮热和内分泌治疗的副作用在对三项临床试验的汇总分析中，针灸显着减少了乳腺癌女性接受内分泌治疗时出现的潮热和其他激素副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Acupuncture-reduces-hot-flashes-and-side-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-in-women-with-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Acupuncture-reduces-hot-flashes-and-side-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-in-women-with-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48e30736-f794-4c04-88a7-1ba483457206 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 14:06:12 -0400 Acupuncture reduces hot flashes and side effects of endocrine therapy in women with breast cancer
利用人工智能改善胃镜诊断胃镜检查期间，使用内窥镜检查食道、胃和十二指肠。这是一根细而柔韧的管子，顶端有一个灯和一个摄像头。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Using-AI-to-improve-gastrooscopy-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Using-AI-to-improve-gastrooscopy-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4ef194e-9bea-4f49-8fe2-81bf28ea6655 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:59:53 -0400 Using AI to improve gastroscopy diagnostics
用于抑郁症个性化经颅磁刺激的电生理标记并非所有抑郁症患者都对药物有反应。最近发表的两项研究提供了关于如何进一步增强替代疗法——经颅磁刺激（TMS）——的更多信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Electrophysiological-markers-for-personalizing-transcranial-magnet-stimulation-in-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Electrophysiological-markers-for-personalizing-transcranial-magnet-stimulation-in-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=110c674a-f493-468d-8bdb-4510e175ac04 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:53:09 -0400 Electrophysiological markers for personalizing transcranial magnetic stimulation in depression
创新的 SRPFM 技术可实现纳米级流体中的超灵敏力测量突破性的研究揭示了一种测量水中纳米级极其微小的力的新方法，突破了科学家对微观世界了解的界限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Innovative-SRPFM-technique-enables-ultra-sensitive-force-measurement-at-nanoscale-in-fluids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Innovative-SRPFM-technique-enables-ultra-sensitive-force-measurement-at-nanoscale-in-fluids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09399c00-4758-4962-8756-0030ae072765 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:31:37 -0400 Innovative SRPFM technique enables ultra-sensitive force measurement at nanoscale in fluids
膳食蔗糖调节果蝇中锂的调节活性一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 11 期，题为“Dietary sucrose indicates the Regulatory Activity oflithium”对果蝇基因表达和寿命的影响。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Dietary-sucrose-modulates-lithiums-regulatory-activity-in-Drosophila.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Dietary-sucrose-modulates-lithiums-regulatory-activity-in-Drosophila.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7ef5f2-1c61-4edf-8bc5-e2330ae1b3a6 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:16:42 -0400 Dietary sucrose modulates lithium's regulatory activity in Drosophila
索马鲁肽为患有心力衰竭的女性提供双重益处索马鲁肽是一种最初开发用于治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症的药物，可显着改善患有常见类型心力衰竭的男性和女性的症状，而这种心力衰竭几乎没有治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Semaglutide-provides-double-benefit-for-women-with-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Semaglutide-provides-double-benefit-for-women-with-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5141942-ffac-42b9-9156-2bbc15cfa2c3 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:08:28 -0400 Semaglutide provides double benefit for women with heart failure
针对肠道微生物组：治疗糖尿病的新方法研究人员回顾了肠道微生物群在糖尿病发病机制和治疗中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Targeting-the-gut-microbiome-A-new-approach-to-treating-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Targeting-the-gut-microbiome-A-new-approach-to-treating-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e0f41bc-a4bf-46af-b13f-17b77649d664 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 10:30:00 -0400 Targeting the gut microbiome: A new approach to treating diabetes
医生很快就能使用人工智能来检测和诊断癌症吗？研究人员开发了二元和多类机器学习模型来区分癌症和非癌组织样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Will-it-soon-be-possible-for-doctors-to-use-AI-to-detect-and-diagnose-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Will-it-soon-be-possible-for-doctors-to-use-AI-to-detect-and-diagnose-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b54d534-f98e-4297-9662-191d3383da17 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 10:20:00 -0400 Will it soon be possible for doctors to use AI to detect and diagnose cancer?
步行和教育干预可显着减少腰痛复发研究人员进行了一项随机对照试验，以确定 WalkBack 个性化步行和教育干预计划在预防澳大利亚人下背痛复发方面的临床疗效和成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Walking-and-education-intervention-significantly-reduces-recurrence-of-low-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Walking-and-education-intervention-significantly-reduces-recurrence-of-low-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fd3cb9a-7f39-4a3e-9ae2-c5c20b86e870 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 09:50:00 -0400 Walking and education intervention significantly reduces recurrence of low back pain
退休前后 12 个月的高强度阻力训练可能会带来持久的好处研究人员调查了不同强度的监督阻力训练对退休年龄成年人的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/12-months-of-heavy-resistance-training-around-retirement-may-have-long- permanent-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/12-months-of-heavy-resistance-training-around-retirement-may-have-long- permanent-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9ebb5f8-4525-4958-a3cc-6e1d6ece355d Mon, 24 Jun 2024 09:23:00 -0400 12 months of heavy resistance training around retirement may have long-lasting benefits
